Getting Started

Installation

ProjectR can be installed in several ways. To install the current release version (from R/Bioconductor):

source('http://www.bioconductor.org/biocLite.R')
biocLite('ProjectR')

You may also install the developmental version of ProjectR directly from the Github repo:

require(devtools)
devtools::install_github('genesofeve/projectR')
